about_the_game:
Kickrexing brings you the most "most exhilarating", no holds barred t-rex kickboxing experience ever seen in the history of rexkind. Featuring ultra-realistic motion capture from real t-rex champs, with amazing graphics built to grantee that you’ll be sure to feel every kick, every punch and every tail swing. Within your own gym, you can train your "customizable" Kickrexer and seek the glory in career mode, or duke it out with other players in a deep and satisfying local and online multiplayer modes. Whether on a keyboard, or using a controller, Kickrexing plays just as great as it looks, delivering the ultimate kickrexing experience on Steam. Download Kickrexing Today!

INCREDIBLY FUN GAMEPLAY


FREE! Hilariously fun-yet-challenging local, and online multiplayer PVP experience. Create, mange and/or join tournaments in closed or open servers. With a solo career mode if you prefer kickrexing against well trained AI. Not to mention the tightly refined (and customizable) player controls, with a wide range of kickrexing moves that will satisfy both beginner and expert players. Easy to pick up, and NOT easy to master at all!

THE REX IS YOURS


Character/Avatar customization to make a badass Kickrexer of your choice! Go to your gym to train your Kickrexer, you can improve you gym, to afford a better place for your Kickrexer to train it's skills through some unique mini-games.

FANCY STUFF


From the mini games, to the belt titles to conquer, either in solo mode, or from online opponents. So get ready to may be lose a belt/trophy or add a new one to your wall! Amazing quality art and animation style, inspired by the real Kickrexing tournaments we grew up watching on TV & VHS tapes. In addition to Achievements and leaderboards to push you further in the competetion!
T-Rex[s] are powered by Unreal Engine's tech, so expect an unreal Kickrexing experience!

A REAL WIN


Regardless you play in career mode or in online mode, there is always something to collect. Starting from virtual belts to add to your in-game wall, ending up with a real Kickrexing trophy sent to you when you win the public grand KRC (aka Kickrexing Championship).

name: Kickrexing

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-bit or higher
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX or AMD Radeon 6870 HD series card or higher

short_description: Kickrexing brings you the most "most-exhilarating", no holds barred t-rex FREE kickboxing experience ever seen in the history of rexkind. Featuring ultra-realistic MOCAP from real t-rex champs, with amazing graphics built to grantee that you’ll be sure to feel every kick, punch and tail swing.
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic*, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Italian, Polish, Turkish
*languages with full audio support
